But it came at a cost with questions being raised over his fitness.
With Harry Grant injured and Cameron Smith now retired, the Kiwi Test star has had the perfect opportunity to state his case to be… [+3303 chars]

articles.author: Peter Ryan
articles.title: Hamstring sidelines Cameron, but new faces galore in Saturday teams - The Age
articles.description: Geelong will be without star recruit Jeremy Cameron against Adelaide after he re-injured his hamstring at training on Wednesday.
articles.content:
